tourName: Romantic Croatian Itinerary: Island Hopping Getaway
placesVisited: Dubrovnik, Korcula Island, Mljet, Hvar, Vis, Lastovo
generalInfo: This luxurious, 7-day Croatian Island adventure embraces a romantic mentality that reveals the life-infusing value of both love and travel. As you embark on this intimate adventure together, you will cherish your time spent in this idyllic enclave, which will be much like enjoying a feast of life and love. Amid the Croatian Islands with your partner by your side, you will see that you can have your cake and eat it too. From sailing and swimming to exploring charming towns and seaside villages, you will cherish every moment spent in this idyllic corner of the world.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik - Arrive in Dubrovnik and Be Awed by the Old City
dayInfo.description: As you arrive in Dubrovnik, your private driver will meet you at the airport and lead you to your luxurious accommodation, and after settling in, you will begin a walking tour of the iconic Old City. While you stroll side-by-side within the towering walls of this ancient fortress and marvel at the UNESCO World Heritage Site, you will know deep in your heart that Croatia was the perfect choice. After taking photos of your favorite views, your Old City tour will come to a close. Afterward, it will be time for you to be the subject of the photographs as a professional photographer whisks you away to some of the most stunning spots in all of Dubrovnik for a private coupleâs photoshoot. While this will not only be a fun and enjoyable experience shared with your significant other, it will also provide you with priceless memories from this amazing trip. Once the last lens flickers and your photoshoot has come to an end, your private driver will return you to your luxurious Dubrovnik accommodation, where you will have the rest of the evening at your leisure.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik - Sail Away on a Romantic Elaphiti Islands Excursion
dayInfo.description: As you wake up to your first full day in Croatia, a trio of enigmatic islands awaits to delight you. Known as the Elaphiti Islands, the three gorgeous enclaves of Sipan, Lopud, and Kolocep each offer their own unique charms to make your excursion unforgettable. As you embark on this private tour, you will sail aboard a state-of-the-art liner from Dubrovnik to Sipan, which will be your first stop. After your local guide introduces you to the secret spots that only the residents know about, such as idyllic coves and hidden inlets, you will enjoy some free time to frolic among the crystalline waters or to bask in the sun. Your fun in the sun and sea will have surely awakened your appetite, so you will be delighted to dine at a nearby eatery on a Dalmatian feast that will be fit for royalty. After having your fill of some of the freshest seafood dishes in all of Europe, you will set sail to your next destination, which will be the lovely island of Lopud. Known for its stunning beaches, this gem of the Adriatic offers you an abundance of ocean activities to entertain yourselves today. It does not get better than swimming together amid a sparkling sea on an exotic island. You can also opt to snorkel, sunbathe, fish from aboard, hike, and more. As this is an absolutely handcrafted tour, the pair of you get to make the final decisions, ensuring that you have the ideal island day. The island of Kolocep will conclude your comprehensive day tour, and this is where you will be amazed and inspired by the picturesque architecture that dates back to the 9th and 11th centuries. After strolling through the most of the scenic spots, you will return to the Dubrovnik docks, where your private driver will meet you and deliver you to your luxurious accommodation for the evening.

dayInfo.title: Korcula â Stroll Around Korcula Island and Sip at a Private Wine Tasting
dayInfo.description: Day three is a day that will be filled with sipping, sailing, and strolling as you make your way to Korcula Island. After arriving at the island on a state-of-the-art liner, your private driver will lead you to your luxurious accommodations, which will act as your new base for the remainder of your adventure through the Croatian Islands. Your private tour of this remarkable place will begin in the charming towns of Lumbarda and Vela Luka, and as you stroll amid the peaceful ambiance of this island enclave, you will be regaled with fascinating facts from your expert guide about what daily life is like here in addition to some of the history of this special corner of the world. Following these two treasures will be the charming destinations of Blato and Smokvica. Smokvica makes for an especially unique stop, and you will be provided with the rare opportunity to visit an actual vineyard, where you will witness how local wine is produced before sampling some of the regionâs famous blends for yourselves. The culmination of your private wine tour and tasting will take the shape of a gourmet feast among the vineyardâs luscious clusters of grapes and vines. Upon finishing your mouthwatering meal, you will make several stops at the nearby fishing villages of Grscica, Prizba, and Brna, all of which are sure to delight you. After such a romantic day that will have been full of sunshine, charming villages, gourmet food, and fine wine, you will be returned to your Korcula accommodation.

dayInfo.title: Korcula â Feel Like Honeymooners on a Hike Around Mljet Island
dayInfo.description: Your perfect vacation will continue as you make your way to magical Mljet Island to share an adventure in the great outdoors. Famed for its natural park, Mljet is a must-visit for every nature lover who ventures to Croatia. By departing from Korcula in the morning aboard a luxury vessel, you will arrive at Mljet with the whole day ahead of you. An exhilarating nature hike in the majestic scenery of Mljet National Park will be first on your agenda, and as you wander among this pristine wonderland, you will create memories that you will cherish forever. During your hike, you will stop at the parkâs gorgeous saltwater lakes, where you can swim in some of the clearest waters you have ever seen. The highlight of your tour will come when you make your way to the largest lake in the park, which has a small islet within it and a magical monastery. As if out of a storybook, this monastery is truly a special place, and as you step foot within it and tour its grounds, you will sense how sacred the space really is. Upon the conclusion of your tour, you will sail back to your luxurious accommodation.

dayInfo.title: Korcula - Escape to Hvar and Enjoy a Private Picnic in an Olive Grove
dayInfo.description: After enjoying the natural beauty of the Croatian Islands on an epic hike yesterday, you will follow up your delight by enjoying the tastes that these islands can create, specifically the local treasure that is known as island green gold or pure olive oil. Your specific destination for todayâs tour is Hvar and its neighboring islands, which promise a dazzling, and delicious, day. Upon departing Korcula and arriving at Hvar Island, you will enjoy a private tour of the Old Town before being allowed to explore this picturesque nook. After strolling through the winding streets that are dotted with cute cafes and boutiques, a tour of a local estate where olive oil is produced awaits. After touring the estate, visiting the olive grove, and witnessing how olive oil is produced, you will enjoy a picnic on the estate grounds amid the olive groves. Your meal will also be prepared in the traditional island manner: slow-cooked over an open fire. The rest of your day will be filled with the Paklinski Islands, where you will have your option of swimming, snorkeling, or relaxing among the island scenery. Perhaps, the most exciting destination of the day will be the Blue Cave. Your day will then finish with a visit to Vis Island and the Blue Lagoon on Budikovac island before returning to your Korcula accommodation for the night.

dayInfo.title: Korcula - Reconnect with Nature and Each Other on Lastovo Island
dayInfo.description: Your final full day will bring you the incredible opportunity to reconnect with nature as you journey to Lastovo Island, which is a pristine nature preserve that offers nearly limitless outdoor activities. Much more secluded and less trafficked than the other islands, Lastovo is a haven of peace, serenity, and unmatched beauty, making it the perfect playground for you to relax the entire day away. Upon arriving at Lastovo, you will embark on an epic hike, and as you trek together through luscious trails and spectacular scenery, you will sense the specialness of this treasure. After your trek is completed, a trip to Lastovo Village awaits, and this is where you will be instantly amazed by the slower-paced daily life that the locals live. The remainder of your afternoon will be spent as you desire, and you will have the choice of many offerings, including swimming in the blue waters of the island, snorkeling, and more. Just before the sun sets and you have had your fill of fun, it will be time to relax and pamper yourselves with a coupleâs massage by the sea. After your massage, the two of you will sail back to Korcula in a state of utter bliss and sweet serenity. Your private driver will be waiting at the docks to return you to your Korcula accommodations.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik â Sail Back to Dubrovnik and Partake in a Goodbye Brunch
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will wake up and sail back to Dubrovnik wondering where the time went because each day was full of spectacular experiences that they flew by way too fast. After enjoying an authentic Dalmatian brunch, you will be transferred to the airport to catch your flight home.
